Evaluate head circumference , seizure activity neurologic outcomes 3 . To evaluate brain MRI 4 . Compare blood urine analysis , head circumference , seizure activity neurologic outcome MRI finding
DOC.brief_title: A Natural History Study Molybdenum Cofactor Isolated Sulfite Oxidase Deficiencies
DOC.criteria: 1 . Both live decease patient age consider study inclusion . 2 . Diagnosis MoCD isolate SOX deficiency 3 . Documented informed consent 1 . MoCD Type A patient Study ALXMCD501 2 . Deceased patient unknown genotype ( Amendment 4 )
